static_fields.name: Windows Hakose Steel - komon
static_fields.description: Available in stainless steel or in 18K rose gold, the rectangular case of the 7 Windows symbolizes the imperfection of our earthly world, while the round shape of the dial symbolizes perfection, infinity, calm. The 7 sapphire crystal windows reveal the hand-painted urushi dial, viewed through the watch case from a multitude of different angles.
static_fields.offers.description: Available in stainless steel or in 18K rose gold, the rectangular case of the 7 Windows symbolizes the imperfection of our earthly world, while the round shape of the dial symbolizes perfection, infinity, calm. The 7 sapphire crystal windows reveal the hand-painted urushi dial, viewed through the watch case from a multitude of different angles.
